nodes.name: getStoreFrontProducts

addAdmin(bytes32,address).return: userName of the newly added admin

params.newStoreFrontName: for the store front to be added

addStoreFront(bytes32).return: newStoreFrontName of the newly added store front

addStoreOwner(bytes32,address).return: userName of the newly added store owner

addStoreProducts(uint256,bytes32,uint256.return: storeProductName of the newly added product

params.storeFrontNumber: for which products to be retrieved

getStoreFrontProducts(uint256).return: storeFrontProductNames of all products in the store front

login().return: the name of the person logged in

signup(bytes32).return: the name of the person signed up

toggleEmergency().return: emergency flag will be returned with the right status

addAdmin(bytes32,address).notice: function to set up a new admin         requires new admin name and address are not blank         requester needs to be an existing admin

addStoreFront(bytes32).notice: function to set up a new store front         requires new store front name is not blank         requester needs to be an existing store owner

addStoreOwner(bytes32,address).notice: function to set up a new store owner         requires new store owner name and address are not blank         requester needs to be an existing admin

addStoreProducts(uint256,bytes32,uint256.notice: function to add a product to a store front         requires new product name is not blank; quantity and unit price >= 0         requester needs to be owner of the store front where the product is being added

getAllStoreFronts().notice: function to retrieve all available store fronts

getMyStoreFronts().notice: function to retrieve store front names of the requester

getStoreFrontProducts(uint256).notice: function to retrieve all products in a store front

login().notice: check is user exists and return user role

signup(bytes32).notice: sign up as online shopper only:         check if user exists, if yes, return user name;         if no, check if name was sent, if yes, create and return user

toggleEmergency().notice: function to set or release an emergency by setting the emergency flag         setting the emergency flag stop key business functions performed by store owners or online onlineShoppers         like adding stores fronts, or making purchases         Only admins can set or release the emergency flag

update(bytes32).notice: function to update user name only         requires new user name is not blank         requester to be an existing user and can only change his/her name
